english.segment1: I bought my ticket and I paid in cash. I thought that this time the ride would last. And lead me to what I am looking for
english.segment2: I see the world as it rushes by. But nothing new is grabbing my eye. Just everything that I have tried before
english.segment3: Maybe I've been looking in the wrong place. Maybe I've been thinking that the world will. Fill me up full enough but it never works that way
english.segment4: There is just one thing that fills me up. One thing that's true. There is just one thing that satisfies. That one thing is You
english.segment5: Show me everything I did not see. While I was searching the world for what was right in front of me. So much wasted wasting time
english.segment6: I see that I've been headed down the wrong track. Now I don't wanna ever go back. To the way it was all because. You're all I'll ever need
english.segment7: I'm tired of settling for this world and its bitter dreams. There's nothing here that satisfies like You
